title: Champs Elysees Recipe
full_text:
Champs Elysees Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
cognac
1/2
ounce
green Chartreuse
1/4
ounce
fresh lemon juice
1/8
ounce
simple syrup
2
dashes
Angostura bitters
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
